ygData.subject: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, I have another complaint about the Shadow Knight. I just recently found out that the Shadow Knight get Breath Of The Dead and Shadow Sight at level 49.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, I have another complaint about the Shadow Knight. I just recently found
out that the Shadow Knight get Breath Of The Dead and Shadow Sight at level
49. While Paladins get a new line of buff and Revive at level 49, SKs get
spells that basically mimic a Greater Lighstone and a Fishbone Earring. Yes,
that is correct, my friends, after 49 levels of getting KOSed, experience
penalties and sitting for hours to heal, we are rewarded with an enhancement
to vision - ultravision that Dark Elves already have at level 1. And if one
has a Fishbone Earring, then 'Yay!' for us because there goes another wasted
slot in the book. In conclusion, at level 50, the Shadow Knight will have
Voice Graft, Shieldskin, Breath Of The Dead and Shadow Sight that he/she
will never use.
